Clues can't be same or part of the passw: Clues can't be same or part of the Password to guess.
Each round start with 6 points as possib: Each round start with 6 points as possible points to earn, and it goes down with each new clue given after the first one.
Game is made of rounds, where in each ro: Game is made of rounds, where in each round a new Password is given to be guessed.
Game start with a password given to Memb: Game start with a Password given to Member 1 of each team, and Team A start playing where Member 1 check the Password, then gives one-word clue to Member 2 of his team to try n guess the Password.
If Team A guessed it wrong, it's Team B: If Team A guessed it wrong, it's Team B turn to try to guess, where Member A give a new clue to Member 2.
If it's guessed after 2 clues are given,: If it's guessed after 2 clues are given, that's 5 points, and so on.
If no one guessed it after 7 clues, that: If no one guessed it after 7 clues, that's the end of the round without any one earning points.
In next round, member teams switch roles: In next round, member teams switch roles, where Member 1 become the guesser, and Member 2 is clue giver.
Round ends when a Member 2 guess the pas: Round ends when a Member 2 guess the Password right.
So if password is guessed with only 1 cl: So if Password is guessed with only 1 clue given, that's 6 points to guessing team.
Team with most scores after certain numb: Team with most scores after certain number of rounds wins. Number of rounds should be 4 or one of its multiplies.
The game is about guessing a password, o: The game is about guessing a Password, one word of Arabic language, which could be a noun, verb or adjective.
This app covers the role of the game coo: This app covers the role of the game coordinator / master
This is a game for two teams, each team: This is a game for two teams, each team is made of two members. Let's call them Team A & Team B, and each team have Member 1 & Member 2.
Winner team is the one that collects mos: Winner team is the one that collects most points of all played rounds.
